CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 2, 1961, pg. 2B reads: "Miller, Belmar Students Visit Flower Show- Wide-eyed visitors, captivated by the beauty of the Flower Show, included students [form] Belmar and Miller Street Schools...In the upper photo, students from Belmar are under the direction of the following faculty members: Mrs. Rose Nickens, Mrs. Ruth Arthur, team mother; Mrs. Charlotte Pearlman, Miss Janet Mackrell and Miss Barbara Schiffman... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Belmar school children with five faculty members, left to right: Rose Nickens, Ruth Arthur, Charlotte Pearlman, Janet Mackrell, and Barbara Schiffman, standing in Phipps Conservatory
